title: How to Make Fluffy Slime Without Borax

steps.headline: Pour the glue into a bowl.
Combine the warm water with the glue.
steps.description: Don't add too much water or it'll be very runny.

steps.headline: Add in your food colouring and mix thoroughly.
steps.description: If the food colouring is a particularly potent one, start by adding two drops, so you don't stain your hands.

steps.headline: Add in the shaving cream and mix thoroughly.
steps.description: When it's fully combined in, the texture should resemble marshmallow cream.

steps.headline: Add in a few pumps of lotion for a stretchier slime.
Add in the liquid laundry detergent.
steps.description: Don't add it all at once - you risk your slime hardening.

steps.headline: Knead your slime.
steps.description: Once the slime has become too solid to stir, use your hands to start kneading it to make it less sticky.

steps.headline: Play with your slime!
steps.description: Store it in an airtight container.
